Actions.Name: Exalt Erenhelion
Actions.Description: At the start of the Round, the [name] either chooses Crush Cowards or Break the Mighty. At the end of the round, the chosen effect occurs.

ListedItems.Name: Crush Cowards
ListedItems.Description: Effect: The [name] raises its weapon. At the end of the round, it sweeps out with a massive slash, affecting a burst 3 (self) area effect around it, with different effects depending on how close characters are. Foes 3 spaces away take 10 damage. Foes 2 spaces away take 5 damage. Adjacent foes take 1 damage.

ListedItems.Name: Break the Mighty
ListedItems.Description: Effect: The [name] raises its shield. At the end of the round, it slams its shield down. Adjacent characters take 6 damage and are shoved 2 spaces away. Collide: Characters take 6 damage again and are stunned.

Actions.Name: Joyous Combat
Actions.Effects: All adjacent foes must choose: be shoved 2, or take 4 damage from the [name].

Actions.Name: Storm Cunning
Actions.Description: Swap places with an ally in range, removing and placing both characters. Bloodied characters gain 3 vigor.

Actions.Name: Bull Rush
Actions.Description: The [name] rushes 1. An adjacent character when it finishes its movement is either weakened or shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Leap
Actions.Description: The [name] flies 2. When it lands, all adjacent characters are shoved 1. If it starts this move from a higher elevation and ends on a lower one, increase the fly to 4, and all adjacent characters when it lands take 2 damage.
